p: All the assays were performed in triplicate and in three independent times. Data were expressed as the mean ± SD. The dose response curves, graphs were drawn and IC 50 were calculated by four parameter logistic equation, and student’s t-test and/or the Kruskal–Wallis test were carried out by GraphPad Prism ® 8.02 (GraphPad Software, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA). The p value < 0.05 was considered a significance difference between comparison groups.
